thread.title: Viola Davis Says We Made Trump Happen
thread.title_full: Viola Davis Says We Made Trump Happen

title: Viola Davis Says We Made Trump Happen
text: Jan 8, 2017 After five nominations, Viola Davis finally won a Golden Globe for her role in Fences . Following the win, she headed backstage and took a few moments to express her thoughts on Trump's America. "I hope, believe it or not, we remove Trump from the equation, because I feel that it's bigger than him," she told reporters. Instead of focusing on the incoming president, Davis encouraged us to look at ourselves and our own role in the current political situation. "I believe that it is our responsibility to uphold what it is to be an American, and what America is about, and the true meaning of what it means to pursue the American dream. I think that America in and of itself has been an affirmation. But I think that we've fallen short a lot, because there is no way that we can have anyone in office that is not an extension of our own belief system. So then what does that say about us? And I think that, if you answer that question, I think that says it all." Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
